Name: Planet Miner
About the game: The Planet Miner is a game about planet colonization. In Planet Miner, you play as rover tasked with finding mineral and building base on alien planet. Build new structures, upgrade your rover and rech to the portal. KEY FEATURES The Minerals is a main resours in game. You must find them in the Fog. If you dont find all minerals in area, after load game fog cover all area again. Rover consum energy. You can charge rover on base. Try find minerals before energy will be end.
